full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL PHYOGS GANG LA YANG GNYUG MAR GNAS PA'I YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD KUN TU 'KHYER BDE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B *, ,(YUL PHYOGS GANG LA YANG GNYUG MAR GNAS PA'I YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD KUN TU 'KHYER BDE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LUNG DANG RTOGS PAS MNGON PAR BTHO BA CHOS RJE BLO GROS, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA MKHAN PO BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS, CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI 'PHRIN LAS PA THER GU'ANG THA' JE SANGS RGYAS RNAMS 'GROS THOG NAS BSKUL BA LTAR, DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS, LEGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, CHOS MTHUN GYI SLOB BU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RATNAS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, , BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
